summary: A suite of unit tests that verify the correctness of a serialization library by round‑tripping a wide range of objects—including built‑in and custom neural network layers, functions, lambda expressions, NumPy‑based layers, tensors, shapes, dictionaries, and shared or nested objects—ensuring they can be saved and restored accurately.
business_intent: Provide confidence that machine‑learning models and associated data structures can be persisted and reloaded reliably, facilitating model deployment, versioning, and reproducibility across environments.
